text:
When running a simple project, of kind pluglet, in IBM RSM (or RSA) an exception
is throw, ClassDefNotFoud: Layout of Log4j.
If i running this project merging your code to a common java project, this
exception doesn´t throw and i can write a log in a different layout (simple,
html, xml and pattern).
creator: mirkos@gmail.com
mirkos@gmail.com
text:
Created attachment 15082
Source Code where it

Look this simple code.

Are you sure that this is not a configuration issue in your webapp(?) server, 
not being able to find the log4j related classes?  We are going to need more 
info in order to evaluate this bug.
creator: mwomack@apache.org

text:
(In reply to comment #2)
> Are you sure that this is not a configuration issue in your webapp(?) server, 
> not being able to find the log4j related classes?  We are going to need more 
> info in order to evaluate this bug.

Well, thanks to answer me (but your answer contains more questions). First: i
did this source run in Eclipse Plataform like a common Java Project, and no did
occur an error.
Second: My RSM/RSA found log4j.jar without problem and it´s linked to editor
like others jar.

This exception continue.

Regards
creator: mirkos@gmail.com
